titleStmt.title: Thomas D. Snyder, Jr. to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7838

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
SAMUEL A. SARGENT,
REAL ESTATE AND LOAN AGENT,
Office, No. 2 Apollo Buildings,
NORTH-WEST CORNER OF FIFTH AND WALNUT STREETS,
Cincinnati, O Dec 22 1862
To the Secretary of State
Frankfort Ky
Sir
I wish to procure the appointment of commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in the State of Ohio Will you be so kind as to send me the necessary Blanks or information in regard to the matter

hoping to hear from you
I remain respectfully yours
Thomas D Snyder Jr.
Lock Box 496, Cin Ohio

Ohio
Comr of Deeds
Tho. D Snyder
Cin
Appd Decr 23. 1862
